txt_en: Hard work is the price of greatness.
txt_cn: 努力奋斗方能成就伟大。

txt_en: Everyone’s beautiful in their own peculiar way.
txt_cn: 每个人都有自己独特的美。

txt_en: Friendship is vowing toward immortality.
txt_cn: 友谊是不朽的誓言。

txt_en: Enjoy your youth while you can.
txt_cn: 趁现在，好好享受青春吧。

txt_en: It's headed towards summer.
txt_cn: 夏日将至。

txt_en: Love is patient, love is kind.
txt_cn: 爱是忍耐与仁慈。

txt_en: Anyone can be anything.
txt_cn: 任何人都能成为自己想成为的人。

txt_en: If you don't like where you are, just picture where you wanna be.
txt_cn: 你若不满此刻的境遇，就想想自己所憧憬的世界。

txt_en: Life's full of possibilities.
txt_cn: 人生充满无限可能。

txt_en: You are lucky to be alive. So live every day to the fullest.
txt_cn: 活着已是幸运，所以每天都要活得精彩。

txt_en: Persistence is the secret to success in exam preparation.
txt_cn: 坚持，是备考成功的秘诀。

txt_en: There are 5 billion people on this planet and you're the perfect mom for me.
txt_cn: 这个地球上有50亿人，而你是我最好的妈妈。

txt_en: Life is a journey.
txt_cn: 生命是一场旅程。

txt_en: We are born ceaselessly into the future.
txt_cn: 生而奋斗，永不止步。

txt_en: My life is naught without you.
txt_cn: 没有你，我的人生将毫无意义。

txt_en: Dreams don't come for free.
txt_cn: 梦想不会平白实现。

txt_en: Take chances you never imaged you would.
txt_cn: 抓住来之不易的机会。

txt_en: You should always be yourself.
txt_cn: 忠于自己。

txt_en: Exams are not only tests of knowledge but also of willpower.
txt_cn: 考试是知识的检验，备考是意志的历练。

txt_en: Loving someone and being loved means so much to me.
txt_cn: 对我而言，爱人与被爱都意义非凡。

txt_en: Loving someone and being loved means so much to me.
txt_cn: 对我而言，爱人与被爱都意义非凡。

txt_en: The one thing I cannot live without is you.
txt_cn: 我的生命中唯独不能没有你。

txt_en: You're going to the top of this mountain, broken legs and all.
txt_cn: 哪怕遍体鳞伤，也要登上顶峰。

txt_en: We are all different.
txt_cn: 每个人都是独特的。

txt_en: Feel the fear and do it anyway.
txt_cn: 直面恐惧，勇往直前。

txt_en: From now on, I gonna say yes -- yes to love, yes to adventure, yes to life.
txt_cn: 从现在开始，我要积极地接受一切，去爱，去挑战，去拥抱生活。

txt_en: You can't let the past define who you are.
txt_cn: 别让过去定义现在的你。

txt_en: Life is worth fighting for.
txt_cn: 人生值得奋斗。

txt_en: Mortality gives meaning to human life.
txt_cn: 死亡赋予了生的意义。
